function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of legal and financial support from authorities","Impact":"Inhibits progress towards circular economy, hinders innovation, and limits transition to sustainable practices","Mitigation":"Governments providing decisive legal and financial support to facilitate the transition to circular economy","Technologies":"N/A","People":"Producers, manufacturers, and communities","Owner":"Local, regional, and national authorities"},{"Description":"Innovation across multiple domains required","Impact":"Without innovation, the transition to circular economy will be slow and limited","Mitigation":"Encouraging and funding innovation in product design, production technologies, business models, and consumer behaviors","Technologies":"Innovative technologies in product design and production","People":"Innovators, businesses, and industries","Owner":"Governments, businesses, and industries"},{"Description":"Lack of promotion of green logistics and waste management regulations","Impact":"Inhibits sustainable practices and hinders the transition to circular economy","Mitigation":"Government promotion of green logistics and waste management regulations with reasonable incentives","Technologies":"Green logistics technologies and waste management innovations","People":"Producers, manufacturers, and communities","Owner":"Local, regional, and national authorities"}]}
